name: Utopia Challenge
description:
Simple looking - Fun to Play - hard to excel game

It may look simple but it's not easy to get a high score.

In SnowLine, you will control a skier by tapping on the screen, and he will turn to the opposite direction in which he is moving and try to go through the cones when you hit a cone or if you want outside the cone the game will be over.

In Blocky Road you will control a mini car, tapping the left side of the screen will move the car towards the left and tapping the right side of the screen will move the car towards the right. Press and hold to turn faster and a lite touch you will move the car slightly towards left or right where you press. Try to avoid hitting the walls on the road.

By collecting coins you can get bonus points and you can use those coins to unlock cool characters and vehicles. You have separate leaderboards for Coins and High score. Try to stay at the top of the leaderboards by scoring more points and unlock all the achievements. This game is meant for highly talented people who have lots of patience to score high. Challenge your friends to beat your scores. #utopiachallenge
